name: Palestine
declaringWar: Accept Islam. Or live under its protection.
attacked: Fight in the name of Allah and in the way of Allah. Fight against those who disbelieve in Allah. Strive for the Truth, do not embezzle the spoils; do not break your pledge; and do not mutilate (the dead) bodies; do not kill the children.
defeated: Think not of those who are slain in Allah's way as dead. Nay, they live, finding their sustenance in the presence of their Lord.
introduction: Peace be upon you. I am Ahmed Yasin, I am Ahmed Yasin, the servant of Allah.
tradeRequest: I got a deal for you.
